meta.title: Humboldt Community School District | Humboldt Community School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Humboldt Community School District is a high performing school located in the northwest region of Iowa. The district is comprised of the communities of Humboldt, Dakota City, Hardy, Renwick, and Rutland.

fieldset.label: Enter the term you wish to search for:

p.span:
Iowa Gov. Reynolds orders school closures to be extended through the end of the year.
Administration Office is Closed-Please email or call 332-1330 for assistance.

div.p: Gov. Kim Reynolds & the IA Dept of Ed announced 4/17/20 that all schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year to mitigate the spread of COVID-19. We will continue to offer Continuous Learning. All spring sports are cancelled. Free meals continue for ages 0-18. Call 332-3216, if you need this service-Extension 6429. Here is the April 17 FAQ (Eng/Spanish) and more information will be sent next week as we prepare our Return to Learn plan.

div.div: Following the Governor's advice, the Humboldt and Twin Rivers...
Following the Governor's advice, the Humboldt and Twin Rivers...

div.p: Humboldt Community School District is a high performing school located in the northwest region of Iowa. The district is comprised of the communities of Humboldt, Dakota City, Hardy, Renwick, and Rutland.
